text: "Death to My Hometown" is a 2012 song by Bruce Springsteen and is the third single from his 17th studio album Wrecking Ball. It is a protest song with celtic rock roots thrown into it. It did not chart in the United States or anywhere around the world. == References == Category:2012 songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs Category:Celtic rock songs Category:Protest songs
title: Death to My Hometown
